ticket.title: Add support for nested SQL queries
ticket.original-body: In one of RoR projects I have had to save Model with custom SQL query. I've used nested SQL query. The problem was that all the attributes of the model were quoted. Patch fix this problem. In the model we add new **attr_accesor** and name it like attribute name with "_sql" postfix. Value of this instance variable is our nested SQL query.
ticket.latest-body: In one of RoR projects I have had to save Model with custom SQL query. I've used nested SQL query. The problem was that all the attributes of the model were quoted. Patch fix this problem. In the model we add new **attr_accesor** and name it like attribute name with "_sql" postfix. Value of this instance variable is our nested SQL query.
ticket.original-body-html: In one of RoR projects I have had to save Model with custom SQL query. I've used nested SQL query. The problem was that all the attributes of the model were quoted. Patch fix this problem. In the model we add new attr_accesor and name it like attribute name with "_sql" postfix. Value of this instance variable is our nested SQL query.

version.body: In one of RoR projects I have had to save Model with custom SQL query. I've used nested SQL query. The problem was that all the attributes of the model were quoted. Patch fix this problem. In the model we add new **attr_accesor** and name it like attribute name with "_sql" postfix. Value of this instance variable is our nested SQL query.
version.body-html:
In one of RoR projects I have had to save Model with custom SQL query.
I've used nested SQL query.
The problem was that all the attributes of the model were quoted.
Patch fix this problem.
In the model we add new attr_accesor and name it like attribute name with "_sql" postfix. Value of this instance variable is our nested SQL query.
version.title: Add support for nested SQL queries
Add support for nested SQL queries

version.body: Hm... Sorry but I have one question. Jeremy Kemper changed milestone from 2.x to 3.x so I must rewrite patch to Rails3?
version.body-html:
Hm... Sorry but I have one question.
Jeremy Kemper changed milestone from 2.x to 3.x so I must rewrite patch to Rails3?
version.title: Add support for nested SQL queries

version.body:
Alexander, I think 2.x has come to an end to it's lifecycle. I don't think there will be a 2.4 — only bug fixes to 2.3.x — hence no feature changes (at least in theory) can be done on that branch. Hence the change in the milestone.
If you would like to work on making that patch for 3 I guess you can go ahead. Else I can close this ticket.
version.body-html:
Alexander, I think 2.x has come to an end to it's lifecycle. I don't think there will be a 2.4 — only bug fixes to 2.3.x — hence no feature changes (at least in theory) can be done on that branch. Hence the change in the milestone.

If you would like to work on making that patch for 3 I guess you can go ahead. Else I can close this ticket.
version.title: Add support for nested SQL queries

version.body: Thank you for the reply! Ok, I will rewrite this patch for Rails3.
version.body-html:
Thank you for the reply!
Ok, I will rewrite this patch for Rails3.
version.title: Add support for nested SQL queries

version.body: This supra footwear is called a modern vintage and has been since their introduction in 2003 where they began in Europe. Every supra shoes has some type of ornament, adornment or hardware and is comprised of aged leather that is bought from around the world. These supra uk are culturally engaging and allow for the woman wearing them to be enveloped in luxury.With new cuts and styles and hand stitched shoes, these timberland boots, heels or flats will make every foot look like it stepped out of vintage Hollywood. This timberland shoes have been worn and coveted by many of the most famous females in recent history. One such coach outlet, Jennifer Aniston, wears them in public and at home.This company makes many different unique styles of bags outlet from ankle booties to sandals, pumps, moncler jackets online, platforms and wedges. One louis vuitton bag in particular is ideal for the gothic style sense; it is patent leather and laces up the front of the shaft. There are also zippers on each side, and this shoe offers a flat heel of a half inch.Another great moncler jackets sale is featured in People's Style Watch and is called a platform bootie. This ture religion jeans has a raised panel in front of the ankle as well as a heel that measures 4.5 inches. The front offers a leather bandage appearance and is considered high fashion.
